title: Hollywood Nobody
description: Being normal in a world that demands perfection isn’t easy.Scotty Dawn has all the freedom a fifteen-year-old girl could want. As she and her mom, Charley, travel to movie sets for Charley’s work, Scotty’s allowed to go anywhere and be anything. But there are costs to such a life. Scotty doesn’t know who she is, where she comes from, or whom to trust. And who is the mysterious man they’ve been running from? Does he hold the clue to Charley’s big secret? When Scotty writes in her Hollywood Nobody blog, the answers she finds are darker than she had expected. Will she discover whom she can trust and finally make sense of her world?
author: Lisa Samson
